Package moviepackage

Class MovieManager

java.lang.Object
moviepackage.MovieManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMovie, IReviews, ISales
public class MovieManager extends Object implements ISales, IReviews, IMovie
Manager class that implements interface methods to manage movies, sales, and reviews for a cinema.
Since:
2022-10-28

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MovieManager getInstance()
      Checks if there is an existing instance of MovieManager. If none exists, load movie information stored in the data file with deserialiseMovies() and return the instantiated object.
      Returns:
      an instantiated MovieManager instance.

    • close

      public static void close()
      A destructor that saves the current state of the movies array into a .dat file and deallocates memory to the MovieManager object.

    • printMovieTitles

      public void printMovieTitles() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Prints a tabular output of movie titles. Used to support customer class functions to help user to choose a movie. Ignores movies that have been marked as "End of Showing".
      Specified by:
      printMovieTitles in interface IMovie
      Throws:

    • getTop5_rating

      public void getTop5_rating() throws IllegalArgumentException

      Specified by:

    • getTop5_ratingCustomer

      public void getTop5_ratingCustomer() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a copy of the movies array, sorts it by the rating parameter, and prints the information for the first ninvalid input: '<'=5 movies in the array based on array size. Used in customer views, hence ignores movies that are marked as END_OF_SHOWING
      Specified by:
      getTop5_ratingCustomer in interface ISales
